name: Boronoa
description:
Small final assignment for our Videogame Design and Development studies, developed in the span of 2 months working on it roughly part time.

Welcome to Boronoa! A game about life in a magical and wholesome island. Farm, explore, solve puzzles and get to know the inhabitants of Boronoa, both human and mythical!

Developed by (in Alphabetical order): 

  • Álvaro Plaza Such 
  • Francisco José Ponce Martínez 
  • Jorge Pons Asensio 
  • Juan Manuel Martínez Thor 
  • Valerio Marty Rodríguez
